entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (trial_foreman_koseyet.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_14: I think I need to get out of here.
entries.s_16: Are you certain that is what you wish?
entries.s_17: What would you have us do?
entries.s_18: Travel down below. Some of my men have remained behind to assist you in defending this area. Make use of them as you will. It is not just our lives, but the lives of many, that depend on you today.
entries.s_26: You have done masterfully. The droid army is a wrecked heap across the landscape. In gratitude, you may pass freely through this camp anytime you wish.
entries.s_28: I would like to leave now.
entries.s_4: Welcome, good people. Welcome. I am Koseyet, foreman of this mining camp, and we are in the path of disaster.
entries.s_8: An army of droids travels this way, and early reports say that they intend to leave no survivors. We have force walls to defend the upper camp, but if they manage to destroy the generator down below, this pass, and the mining facility to the south, will be open to their assault.
